title: Biden sworn in as US president, declaring ‘Democracy has prevailed’
content:
LIVE #APPNews : Inaugural addresses of Joe Biden President of the United States. @JoeBiden #JoeBidenInauguration #InaugurationDay #Inauguration2021 https://t.co/fK9odzCl1C
— APP  (@appcsocialmedia) January 20, 2021
I congratulate President @JoeBiden on his inauguration. Look forward to working with @POTUS in building a stronger Pak-US partnership through trade & economic engagement, countering climate change, improving public health, combating corruption & promoting peace in region & beyond
— Imran Khan (@ImranKhanPTI) January 20, 2021
Amb Asad M. Khan and Mrs.Zunaira Asad representing Pakistan  at the Inauguration ceremony of President Joe Biden and VP Harris at Capitol Hill#APPNews #Pakistan #USA #JoeBiden #CapitolHill @asadmk17 @ForeignOfficePk pic.twitter.com/d9itTfAi58
